checkout-modal-tos: Having an account at mrg-mall.com help us make a better user experience for you and other customers.
price_changed: This Product Price has been changed since the last time you added it
cart-combined: Your items that you have added as a guest has been combined with your current Cart, Happy Shopping !
cart-tos: The price and availability of items at mrg-mall.com are subject to change. The Cart is a temporary place to store a list of your items and reflects each item most recent price.
